name: Painting Flower Vase - Yellow (free shipping)
description:
Painting Flower + Vase - Yellow

Whimsical flowers came to life when I decided to utilize old paintbrushes as stamens and surround them with carefully crafted canvas oil painting petals.  The placement of the bouquets in vintage dutch genever (gin) bottles make them the perfect decorative or sculptural element for a surface within your home. 

- 8" x 15"
- 20cm x 38cm

*free worldwide shipping

name: Painting iPad Case - Blooms (free shipping)
description:
Painting iPad Case - Blooms

Painting iPad case - Sailboats

Our popular leather handled carry bags made of vintage oil paintings, have been tailored to accommodate and protect your Ipad.  Timeworn painted canvas is fashioned into a bag with a cushioned cotton canvas lining and envelope closure to protect and add style to your technology. 

- 9" x 11.5"
- 23cm x 29cm

*free worldwide shipping

name: Painting Bag - Birch (free shipping)
description:
Painting Bag - Birch

A series of unique, leather handled carry bags made by hand using vintage oil paintings sourced exclusively from markets in Holland and Belgium.  Each bag tells its own story through the juxtaposition of timeworn painted canvases, making each one a distinctive piece of functional, wearable art. This series of carry bags are strong, versatile and spacious, and are designed to show signs of wear with use & age so that their stories live on.

Small tote
33cm x 43cm
13" x 17"

*free worldwide shipping

name: Portrait Wall Hanging (free shipping)
description:
Portrait Wall Hanging 

After years of collecting oil on canvas paintings from markets across Holland and Belgium, some pieces have become just too special, too perfectly perfect, to sacrifice for a one of a kind bag or chair. Some of the hardest to-come-by images are portraits  from the 30’s, 40’s and 50’s. The plan soon became to make faithful reproductions of my favorites all the while preserving some of the best parts of the paintings–not just the faces - but the rough edges, fringes and corners of the canvases too. Carefully photographed to capture the smallest of painting details and printed on linen to create the same tactile feeling of the actual paintings. 

- printed on one continuous piece of heavy textured linen
- two layers of heavy canvas sewn to back
- 250cm long x 125cm wide 
- 8’ long x 4’ wide

*wall mount not included due to shipping restrictions

name: Tram Bag - Monnaie (free shipping)
description:
Tram Bag - Monnaie

Graphic and colorful tram signage from Belgium was repurposed to create these fun bags. Originally,  the heavy plastic material was wound on a roll and changed as the next stop on the tram line was approached.   The signage material paired with a lining and handle of blue and white ticking, and a detachable inner pouch,  make this a functional and durable bag.  All bags are one of a kind. 

- detachable inner pouch
- 17" x 20"
- 43cm x 50 cm

*free worldwide shipping

name: Sampler Book - Belgium (free shipping)
description:
Sampler Book - Belgium 

Hand made antique Belgium lace/crochet samples or examples. Sampler books were popular from the late 1800's to the early 1900's. Some were made by young girls in convents learning lace/crochet skills from the nuns. The handwork is very, very fine. Each piece is basted onto cloth pages. 


17 pages / 34 front and back
9" x 7.5"
23cm x 18cm

*free worldwide shipping

Dog iPad case - (free shipping)

A sleeker version of the vintage oil painting bag cases, these portrait envelopes house and protect your iPad.  Portraits and collaged renderings have been faithfully reproduced onto heavy cotton canvas and fitted with a padded interior. A velcro fastener keeps the bag closed.

name: Drawing Pillow - Penelope (free shipping)
description:
Drawing Pillow - Penelope

These pillow covers came about when I began to create collages of my drawings that I had collected at various markets.  The collages were photographed on heavy cotton canvas and sewn into pillow covers with a blue and white ticking stripe back. Inspired by old black and white photographs that were retouched by hand with color, these drawing collages were then given added dimension with watercolor highlights. Each pillow is one-of-a-kind.  Pillow covers come in both square and rectangular sizes and have a zipper on the bottom for pillow inserts. 

- insert not included - cover only
- 20" square
- 50cm square
- hand wash carefully

*free worldwide shipping

name: Dog Pillow - Murray (free shipping)
description:
Dog Pillow - Murray

After years of collecting oil paintings from markets across Holland and Belgium, some pieces have become just too perfectly perfect to sacrifice for a one of a kind bag or chair.  Some of the hardest to come by images are portraits of mans best friend from the 40's and 50's.  The plan became to make reproductions of my favorites on sturdy canvas, and to preserve not just the faces and paws, but  also the rough edges, fringe and corners of the canvas too. These sweet dogs can now sit on your couch or a favorite chair in the form of a pillow backed with sturdy denim.  Pillow covers come in both square and rectangular sizes and have a zipper on the bottom for pillow inserts. 

- insert not included - cover only
- 12" x 20"
- 35cm x 50cm
- hand wash carefully

*free worldwide shipping

name: Woven Chair - Indigo (free shipping)
description:
Woven Chair - Indigo

A new process began in the workshop with the discovery that these chairs had renewed energy and design appeal once fabric was applied. It begins when a chair is discovered with beautiful form and rungs that lend themselves to this work. Next, influence from macrame and weaving techniques of the 70's, paired with careful consideration of color and placement gets the handiwork started. Traditional woven chairs rely on symmetry and tonal color throughout. While the chair weaving begins this way, designs are made more interesting once slightly asymmetrical and contrasting colors are added in. The final result is a modern update to a traditional sensibility that stands alone as a chair --- or a piece of art --- or both. 

*free shipping

name: Floral Painting Pillow - Primulus (free shipping)
description:
Floral Painting Pillow - Primulus

Some of the first oil paintings I collected were unusual still-life “portraits” of flowers. Photographs of a few of the best were transfered to painter’s canvas, preserving the original hand feel, and then paired with new-old batiks and modern polka dot textile backings. Celebrating all aspects of the original paintings, the edges of the canvas are the edges of the pillows; nail holes, original folds, creases and all.

100% cotton – bottom zipper

50cm x 50cm 
18" x 18"
insert not included/cover only

name: Floral Painting Pillow - Geranium (free shipping)
description:
Floral Painting Pillow - Geranium

Some of the first oil paintings I collected were unusual still-life “portraits” of flowers. Photographs of a few of the best were transfered to painter’s canvas, preserving the original hand feel, and then paired with new-old batiks and modern polka dot textile backings. Celebrating all aspects of the original paintings, the edges of the canvas are the edges of the pillows; nail holes, original folds, creases and all.

100% cotton – bottom zipper

50cm x 50cm 
18" x 18"
insert not included/cover only

name: Sampler Pages - Dutch (free shipping)
description:
Sampler Pages - Dutch

Dutch hand made antique crochet samples or examples. Sampler books/pages were popular from the late 1800's to the mid 1900's. Some were made by young girls in convents learning skills from the nuns. The handwork is very, very fine. Each piece is basted onto paper pages with how-to instructions written below.


30 pages
11" x 7"
29cm x 18cm

name: Sampler Book - French (free shipping)
description:
Sampler books were popular from the late 1800's to the early 1900's. Some were made by young girls in convents learning lace and sewing skills from the nuns. The book includes pages listing an assortment of needles, threads, stitching and crocheting samples.  

Some pieces dated to 1910

8 pages / 16 front and back
13" a 10"
32cm x25cm

name: Myriad Necklace - Flowers (free shipping)
description:
Myriad Necklace - Flowers

Introducing the latest collection of wearable art by Swarm. Each Myriad necklace tells its own story through the unique combination of time worn oil paintings exhibited on thick timber discs. Linked by natural cord, each disc can be turned to display a different part of a painting, allowing the wearer to create a multitude of variations that reflect their outfit du jour and current state of mind. 

40cm drop x 4cm round discs
15.75" drop x 1.5" round discs
